name: Save The Planet (itch) (Guiks)
description:
Game in development!

  • All planets are unlocked for this test build.
  • All planets are using the same art asset.
  • No sound made for this game yet.
  • UI messages/buttons are not final.

Controls

  • Left/Right Arrow: controls the ship or the menu
  • Space: select menu
  • Enter: pause/unpause
